title: Mercedes Benz Lab
description:
Mercedes Benz ADAM Training Centre Overview (ADAM CoE- NIET)

The Mercedes-Benz Centre of Excellence for Advanced Diploma in Automotive Mechatronics, developed in collaboration with Mercedes-Benz India Pvt. Ltd., offers a specialized curriculum addressing the integration of automotive mechanical and electronic systems throughout their life cycle. This advanced diploma responds to industry demand for graduates equipped with specialized skills.

The program encompasses Electrical, Mechanical, Electronics/Embedded Systems, Vehicle Systems, and Soft Skills modules. Students receive hands-on training in Electrical & Electronics Technology, Advanced Automobile Systems, diagnosis, and practical experience with Mercedes-Benz vehicles. Emphasizing self-reliant learning and teamwork, the course mirrors successful practices from MBIL's in-house facilities, preparing graduates for advanced roles in the automotive industry.

NIET is Mercedes Benz Authorized training Centre

for providing training on latest Automative technologies. Mercedes Benz training is to provide University / College pass out Students & Non-working Professionals with locally available, high quality training services on latest automative technologies. We are providing the trainings with same high-quality Engines and Technologies employed by, to service their own students.

Benefits to students

  • Industry needs based course curriculum.
  • Globally recognized ADAM Certificate on successful course completion.
  • Opportunity to learn from Mercedes Benz Trained and Authorized Instructors.
  • Personal copy of study material and on job training.
  • Placement opportunities in Mercedes Benz dealerships across the world.
  • Exposure to working engines, transmissions and car.
  • Electric vehicle fundamentals Training.
  • Seminars and Visiting Lectures from Industry Experts.

title: AICTE IDEA Lab
description:
About IDEA Lab

AICTE-IDEA (Idea Development, Evaluation & Application) Labs are being established across the country for encouraging students for application of science, technology engineering and mathematics (STEM) fundamentals towards enhanced hands-on experience, learning by doing and even product visualization. As a common facility embedded in the institution, the IDEA Lab will make engineering graduates more imaginative and creative, besides getting basic training in the 21st century skills like- critical thinking, problem solving, design thinking, collaboration, communication, lifelong learning etc. IDEA Lab can empower the students and faculty to “engage, explore, experience, express and excel”, addressing the need of new age learning. IDEA Lab would serve as an infrastructure for faculty to take up and promote multidisciplinary education and research. Accordingly, faculty would be encouraged to get trained in these Labs and strive for creating problems/ projects/ internships in their own subjects/ disciplines and mentor the students.IDEA Lab at NIET established in collaboration with AICTE and DROISYS.

Vision for IDEA Lab

To foster an ecosystem of Digital Factory for testing, validation and transformation of ideas into products to support mission AtmaNirbhar Bharat

Integration of IDEA Lab with existing facilities

The institute has well developed facilities in compliance with Industry 4.0 requirements. Facilities such as reverse engineering, rapid prototyping, 3D printing, pneumatic system design lab, CNC machines, robotic arm for MIG welding and higher end software labs etc. are available to be integrated with IDEA Lab.

These facilities are created with the same vision of allowing students to transform their ideas into real products. The faculty mentors are well qualified and trained to provide insight about the usage of these facilities. These cutting edge labs are open beyond institute hours, so the cultural bondage will strengthen the work culture for usage of facilities by innovators and startup companies.

Benefits to students

The students will be encouraged to take up creative work, inculcate the psychomotor & affective domain skills for problem solving and prototype development.

The student will be encouraged to get involved in development of products for creation of intellectual property rights since the lab will be open for all. It will invite many collaborative opportunities among the nearby industries, budding entrepreneurs, startups, alumni, faculty members and students. The facilities will provide a basis for development of cost effective prototypes.

Students and innovators will get an opportunity to develop patentable products based on innovative ideas. faculty members will be able to upgrade themselves on new technologies by joining FDPs, skilling programs, boot camps, conferences, symposiums and workshops.

Tentatively in a year minimum two FDPs, four Skilling Programs, two Bootcamps, four Ideation Camps, four Awareness Camps for industries, four Professional Skilling Programs for ITI skilling students, two School Teacher Awareness Program for teachers of nearby schools, Five Open Day Events for School students, participation in annual technical exhibition will be arranged. Six newsletters will be published in a year.

A conference will be organized every year. Weekend Programs and workshops during summer breaks will be organized for students of nearby institutes of Greater Noida region. The institute has strong industry-institute partnership and regular engagement hence the facility will benefit industry as well. Since, the small industries face a lot of challenges in prototype development, this lab will certainly provide them a great support in reducing the cost and time taken for prototype development.

Alignment with national initiative

The IDEA Lab in the Institute will support all key features of National Technology Vision 2035 by providing opportunities for development, empowerment, inclusiveness, and sustainability.

The lab will provide opportunity to culminate some of the prerogatives defined under National Vision, such as;

  • Clean air and potable water
  • 24x7 energy
  • Decent habitat
  • Quality education, livelihood and creative opportunities
  • Safe and speedy mobility
  • Public safety and national security
  • Eco-friendly conservation of natural resources.

The lab will support technological transformation in the field of education, water, energy, environment, transportation, infrastructure, manufacturing, materials, and ICT by nurturing the culture of innovation. For budding innovators and startups the Lab will provide an ability to absorb failures and learn useful lessons from failed initiatives. The Lab will help in establishment of linkage between innovators and entrepreneurs.

Thirty existing SMEs in the nearby region have already signed MoUs with the Institute for technical support. This lab will provide a base for students and innovators to create prototypes and commercialize the products with the help of these companies. Since NOIDA is a hub of industries, the Lab will promote research sharing for niche products.

Plan for sustenance of IDEA Lab beyond two years

After two years the faculty members will be able to attract consultancy projects of substantial worth from nearby industries. Also, the Lab will be able to generate funds from commercial usage of the facilities by nearby industries at a very nominal rate.

Alongwith that the faculty members and students will be encouraged to create IPRs by using these facilities. Some of these IPRs will certainly find their commercial usage.

The innovative products developed by the innovators and startups will be an input for new startup companies in the institute Technology Business Incubator (TBI-NIET). This will help to develop a closed loop to sustain the set up.

The final year students will use these labs for development of new projects. These projects can find commercial value as prototypes of products in niche areas. The events such as FDPs, Skilling Programs, Bootcamps, Ideation Camps, Awareness Camps for industries, Professional Skilling Programs, School Teacher Awareness Program, Open Day Events for School students, and technical exhibitions will be organized on a regular basis to optimally utilize the resources. Some fee may be charged from participants for sustenance of the lab, if permitted by the Government.

Since the lab will be open 24x7, the students from nearby regions will have an opportunity to use the lab facility beyond institute hours. The products developed by them may be of commercial value for the industry and some amount can be funded by the industry to support these projects under CSR activities.

title: PTC Centre of Excellence

PTC Centre of Excellence (PTC CoE)

NIET is PTC University Authorized Centre of Excellence for providing training on PTC Creo (formerly known as Pro/E WF), PTC Windchill, PTC Reverse Engineering & Rapid Prototyping, PTC AR/VR, PTC IoT Thingworx etc. PTC’s COE is to provide University / College Students & Non-working Professionals with locally available, high quality training services on PTC technologies. We are providing the training’s with same high quality materials and infrastructure employed by PTC, to service their own students.

title: Mobile App Development
description:
Mobile Application Development Lab (iOS)

In collaboration with Apple, iOS App development lab is established where students are able to work and get training on iOS app development. Students are trained by Certified Apple Trainers and webinars are also conducted for training. Students have got the opportunity to learn Swift programming language to build iOS applications and to work on XCode, an IDE for developing applications for Apple products. Platform to get exposure to present and design ideas on international level.

Salient Features

title: Cisco Networking Academy
description:
Details of CISCO (CCNA) Cisco Certified Network Associate Training

CCNA (Cisco Certified Network Associate) is an information technology (IT) certification from Cisco Systems. CCNA certification is an associate-level Cisco Career certification. These entry-level Cisco certifications all require two exams — one of which is the ICND1, as a prerequisite, which should take about three months to study for and pass. The rest of the exams are a coin flip.

The new CCNA program to prepare you for today’s associate-level job roles in IT technologies. CCNA now includes security and automation and programmability.

The program has one certification

It covers a broad range of fundamentals for IT careers, with one exam and one training course to help you prepare. CCNA curriculum includes basic mitigation of security threats, introduction to wireless networking concepts and terminology, and performance-based skills.

Benefits to students

  • Launch your career with the new CCNA certification.
  • Master the essentials including security, automation, and programmability, for rewarding work in a broad range of roles.
  • Rev up your resume with the most highly respected associate level certification in the industry.
  • Link that digital certification badge to all your social media profiles to tell the world what you’ve achieved.
  • Industry-recognized certification.
  • Proficiency in networking fundamentals.
  • Enhanced career prospects.
  • Hands-on experience with Cisco devices.
  • In-depth understanding of network protocols and technologies.

title: Automation Lab
description:
Automation Lab

This lab has various types of Pneumatic and Electro Pneumatic Trainer Kit, Modular Manufacturing System, PLC along with interfacing modules to demonstrate the detailed applications of PLC and SCADA. The purpose of this laboratory is to train the students to be familiar with Pneumatic and Electro Pneumatic Trainer Kit, software and hardware of PLC so that they can gain enough experiences to meet the demand of the automation era. The facilities in the laboratory enable students to build a firm background in PLC hardware as well as software. They acquire the practical skills sufficient to design and realize basic automation process.

PLC laboratory

The PLC laboratory is setup to complement the topics studied in the automation theory course. The lab is equipped with PLC automation trainer kits and modules to enable the study of components of automation system. The students perform experiments to study the components of PLC, programming PLC, interconnection of PLC with computer, SCADA programming and fault detection in automation system.

PLC

A PLC (i.e. Programmable Logic Controller) is a device that was invented to replace the necessary sequential relay circuits for machine control. The PLC works by looking at its inputs and depending upon their state, turning on/off its outputs.

The user enters a program, usually via software, that gives the desired results. PLCs are used in many "real world" applications. If there is an industry present, chances are good if there is a PLC present. Industries involved in machining, packaging, material handling or automated assembly and countless other industries are already using them. If you are not using, you are wasting money and time. Almost any application that needs some type of electrical control has a need for a PLC.

Lab Resources

  • Modular Manufacturing System
  • Advanced Pneumatic Trainer Kit
  • Advanced Electro Pneumatic Trainer Kit
  • Basic Pneumatic Trainer Kit
  • Basic Electro Pneumatic Trainer Kit
  • Transparent Basic Pneumatic Trainer Kit
  • Switch Mode Power Supply
  • Pneumatic Illustrative Wall Poster
  • Magnetic Symbols

Location and Hours

The automation laboratory is located in E-Block, Ground Floor. Open Door Access: 9am - 5:00pm. And for Evening Classes 5pm - 8pm Scheduled classes take priority.

  • Hands-on pneumatic and electro-pneumatic system training.
  • Real-world manufacturing system simulation.
  • PLC programming skills development.
  • Interfacing modules for comprehensive automation understanding.
  • Enhanced practical knowledge for industrial automation careers.
Current Facilities

JASP-Product Animations, Total integrated automation software, Computer, Cut Section/Wall Posters, Magnetic Symbols. JASP-Product Animations, Total integrated automation software, Computer, Cut Section/Wall Posters, Magnetic Symbols.

title: Amazon Web Services
description:
Amazon Web Services

To address the growing demand for cloud computing skills, AWS Educate works with employers and institutions like Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology to prepare students for in-demand careers in cloud computing.

Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology will offer a B. Tech Computer Science. The program includes hands-on activities aligned to entry-level job requirements of cloud-skilled professionals.

The Future Is In The Cloud

Cloud computing has been a top LinkedIn skill for the past five years.
Sounds Interesting?
Visit www.niet.co.in for key information about the course and learning objectives.

What is the cloud?

Cloud computing is the on-demand delivery of IT resources over the Internet with pay-as-you-go pricing. Instead of buying, owning, and maintaining physical data centers and servers, you can access technology services such as computing power, storage, and databases on an as-needed basis from a cloud provider like Amazon Web Services (AWS).

The increasing demand for cloud skills

The global public cloud computing market has consistently grown 15% YoY and is projected to continue to do so through 2022 according to Gartner

title: Dell EMC Academy
description:
NIET is has a well-equipped academy

Running under Dell EMC as a centre of excellence in Big Data and related technologies. Here we define Big Data and related technology that can be defined as a Software-Utility that is designed to Analyse, Process and Extract the information from an extremely complex and large data sets which the Traditional Data Processing Software could never deal with. Here we provide extreme training to students for projects and research under Big Data Hadoop platform. Hadoop is an open-source software framework for storing data and running applications on clusters of commodity hardware.

It provides massive storage for any kind of data, enormous processing power and the ability to handle virtually limitless concurrent tasks or jobs. Hadoop is a valuable technology for big data analytics that Stores and processes humongous data at a faster rate. The data may be structured, semi-structured, or unstructured and protects application and data processing against hardware failures.

Salient Features
  • Industry needs based course curriculum
  • Globally recognized Certificate on successful Big Data course completion
  • Great Opportunity to learn from Industry certified Instructors
  • Personal copy of study material and free recorded lectures and workshops
  • Placement opportunities thru various platforms driven thru industrial collaboration
Name of the Lab Training on Equipment Name/Accessories Details/ Software Details
Big Data Lab (Dell EMC Academy) Centre of Excellence – NIET. BIG DATA HADOOP environment such as HDFS, MapReduce, YARN, HBase, Pig, Hive, Sqoop, Flume, Spark and related technologies. Hadoop on Cloudera Platforms, VM’s, Windows 10/11 64 bit plus Ubuntu 20/21 (Dual Boot), Work Stations ( Dell OptiPlex 3080,Micro pc Core i5, Hard Disk 1 TB, Ram 16 GB, TFT Screen 19 Inch, Keyboard & Mouse)

title: Salesforce Academy
description:
Salesforce Academy Overview

NIET provides training on salesforce according to the requirement of the industry. For this NIET has a dedicated lab. Salesforce is a cloud computing service as a software (SaaS) company that specializes in customer relationship management (CRM). Salesforce's services allow businesses to use cloud technology to better connect with customers, partners and potential customers.

The software has become the number one for customer success and helps businesses track customer activity, market to customers and many more services.

title: Robotics Lab
description:
Industry Supporting

NIET has established Advanced Robotics Control Laboratory to meet the challenges of current scenario in the area of research, innovation and development. Indo-Euro Synchronization is an initiative created by a group of experienced technical and business professionals to connect India and Europe closer together.

Smart simulation software for efficient offline programming: with KUKA.Sim, you can easily and quickly optimize the production operations of your systems and robots – for increased flexibility, productivity and competitiveness.

Software

RobotStudio is built on the ABB Virtual Controller, an exact copy of the real software that runs your robots in production. This allows very realistic simulations to be performed, using real robot programs and configuration files identical to those used on the shop floor.

Training Conducted: Applied Robotic Control (ARC)

The ARC is an initiative by Indo-Euro Sync to provide real time industrial automation solutions in both organizational and academic level. ARC has already been organizing regular student seminars in Germany including workshops and live experiments at APS in Germany. ARC provides to the students the access to industrial robotics under production conditions with remote control.

An extensive exchange program for Indian faculty members guarantees the high quality of the educational lessons and practical courses. These practical courses allow direct control of the industrial robots in Germany from Indian universities. Concretely, the students learn simulating, programming and controlling the robots in order to test their results at these industrial robots, which are equipped with grippers, sensors, etc.

Applied Robotic Control for Industrial Automation:

Students learn individually and as a team to solve concrete industrial tasks which are splits into various suitable sub-tasks for immediate learning success. These tasks are supervised by trained Indian faculty members along with remotely participating German experts. The automation tasks are designed and developed in cooperation with the Indian faculty members.

title: DLT Center of Excellence
description:
Centre of Excellence

Blockchain at NIET in association with DLT Labs is committed to enable the students and the faculty members of the NIET in cutting edge block chain technology. DLT labs built by pioneers with experience across a wide variety of sectors of business, technology and distributed application architecture, development and integration, delivers many of the largest enterprise block chain projects globally and has a successful track record with some of the world’s largest software product integrations. CoE provides the training to the students and the faculty members for the enhancement in the field of TCSion.

Salient Features
  • Industry need based course curriculum.
  • Globally recognized DLT Certificate on successful course completion.
  • Opportunity to learn from DLT Experts.
  • Placement opportunities.

CCNA program

The new CCNA program to prepare you for today’s associate-level job roles in IT technologies. CCNA now includes security and automation and programmability. The program has one certification that covers a broad range of fundamentals for IT careers, with one exam and one training course to help you prepare.

CCNA curriculum includes basic mitigation of security threats, introduction to wireless networking concepts and terminology, and performance-based skills.

title: Capgemini PLM Lab
description:
Capgemini PLM Innovation LAB

A global leader in consulting, technology services and digital transformation, Capgemini is at the forefront of innovation to address the entire breadth of clients’ opportunities in the evolving world of cloud, digital and platforms. Building on its strong 50-year heritage and deep industry-specific expertise, Capgemini enables organizations to realize their business ambitions through an array of services from strategy to operations. Capgemini is driven by the conviction that the business value of technology comes from and through people. It is a multicultural company of over 200,000 team members in more than 40 countries. The Group reported 2018 global revenues of EUR 13.2 billion.

Through this lab students are learning about product life cycle Management and the PTC Windchill software. Students can help in improving both the top line and bottom line of a company. With customers looking at adopting new initiatives such as Model Based Enterprise (MBE), Industry 4.0 and IOT,

PTC Windchill software

Investments in PLM becomes critical and form the backbone of these initiatives. As the products becoming more of electromechanical in nature with increasing software content, PLM becomes the single source of truth of product data for an enterprise.

title: Product Design and Development Lab
description:
Product Design and Development Lab

The Product Design and Development Lab equipped with PTC CREO software offers a dynamic environment for students to engage in the entire product development lifecycle. CREO is a leading CAD software known for its versatility and comprehensive tools for designing, analyzing, and simulating products across various industries. In this lab, students can create intricate 3D models, perform stress analysis, simulate real-world conditions, and generate manufacturing-ready designs.

Current Facilities

  • PTC CREO Parametric 6.0 Software, Work Stations ("CPU: Intel (R) Core(TM)i7-6700 CPU @3.40 GHz)
  • Memory: 8.0 GB
  • Disk: 932 GB
  • GPU: 2.0 GB Dedicated memory, 4.0 GB Shared memory

Benefits

  • Industry-Standard Skill Development: Students gain proficiency in using one of the industry's leading CAD software packages, preparing them for careers in product design, engineering, and manufacturing.
  • Creative Design Exploration: CREO's powerful tools enable students to explore their creativity and turn ideas into tangible designs, fostering innovation and problem-solving skills.
  • Realistic Simulation and Analysis: The software allows for the simulation of various conditions, such as structural integrity, thermal behavior, and fluid dynamics, enabling students to optimize designs and troubleshoot potential issues before production.
  • Collaborative Learning Environment: The lab promotes teamwork and collaboration as students work together on projects, share insights, and provide feedback, mirroring professional settings common in the industry.
  • Integration with Industry Practices: Exposure to CREO prepares students for the demands of modern product development processes, where proficiency in CAD software is a valuable asset. They learn to create designs that are manufacturable, cost-effective, and meet industry standards and regulations.

Overall, the Product Design and Development Lab with PTC CREO software provides students with hands-on experience, practical skills, and a solid foundation for success in the competitive field of product design and engineering.

title: IoT Lab
description:
IoT Lab

IOT lab is developed in NIET under the collaboration with PTC and IBM Watson. We provide training to our students on the various development boards like Arduino UNO, Raspberry Pi etc. and the interfacing of various types of sensors with these development boards. At the final module of the training, students create and implement their innovative ideas through designing of various projects. PTC Thingworx platform contains the most complete set of integrated IOT specific development tools and capabilities making solution development simple, time to market fast and end user solution more compelling.

This introductory course will teach the students that how to model, connect, analyze, and build Internet of Things (IoT) applications using Thingworx, an industry-class platform used by developers across the globe.

Salient Features

  • Industry need based course curriculum.
  • Basic IoT Fundamentals Training.
  • Exposure to live projects.
  • Conceptualizing Smart cities.
  • Seminar and Visiting Lectures from Experts of various industries.

title: Oracle Academy Workforce Development Program
description:
NIET has a running academy under Oracle

A centre of excellence. Oracle Academy provides educational institutions with the resources, they need to help students develop core computing knowledge and skills aligned to industry standards and using current technologies—so they can enrich students with the skills they need to succeed. At Oracle Academy, we know that educational standards required for a student time invested to succeed, and we share this core goal. It's critical that academia and students have access to the right resources to help ensure all achieve postgraduation success, whether moving onto college or graduate school, or into the job market.

Oracle Academy can help educators and students keep up with ever-changing technologies and software to help prepare students for their futures. Academy understand and value educators as collaborators who are empowered to facilitate innovative student learning in and outside the classroom.

Salient Features

  • Industry needs based course curriculum.
  • Globally recognized Certificate on successful course completion.
  • Great Opportunity to learn from Industry built in courses and curriculum.
  • Excellent copy of study material and free recorded lectures.
  • Placement opportunities thru various platforms driven thru industrial collaboration.
Name of Lab Training On Equipment Name/Accessories Details/ Software Details
Oracle Academy Oracle Cloud Computing, Core Java, Applied Data Science and Artificial Intelligence. Online Mode, Computer System / Laptop and High-Speed Internet.

Oracle academy free program

Offers institutions and educators access to a wide range of teaching and educational resources, including curriculum, classroom learning resources, software, cloud technology, practice environments, and much more.

title: SAP Material Management
description:
SAP Material Management

SAP MM is the short form for SAP Material Management system. The roles of SAP MM in a business process are as follows

  • A business process in SAP is termed as a “module”.
  • SAP MM is a part of logistics functions and it helps in managing the procurement activities of an organization.
  • It supports all aspects of material management (planning, control, etc.).
  • It is the backbone of logistics that incorporates modules such as Sales and Distribution, Production Planning, Plant Maintenance, Project Systems, and Warehouse Management.
Salient Features
  • SAP MM is one of the modules of SAP that deals with material management and inventory management.
  • Material Management as a process ensures no shortage of materials or any gaps in the supply chain process of the organization. SAP MM speeds up the procurement and material management activities, making the business run smoothly with complete time and cost efficiency.

Course Certification

  • Exam Name: - SAP Certified Application Associate - Procurement with SAP ERP 6.0 EhP7
  • Exam Code: - C_TSCM52_67 » SAP MM Certification Online Practice Exam Level:- Associate
  • Exam Code: - C_TSCM52_67 » SAP MM Certification Online Practice Exam Level:- Associate
  • Duration: - 180 mins
  • Number of Questions: - 80
  • Passing Score: - C_TSCM52_67 - 60%

title: VMware VSphere Overview
description:
NIET has Innovation VMware Lab

VMware Lab dedicated to VMware IT Academy- A program to build IT skills of secondary and post-secondary students. This course features intensive hands-on training that focuses on installing, configuring, and managing VMware vSphere® 6.7, which includes VMware ESXi™ 6.7 and VMware vCenter Server® 6.7. This course prepares you to administer a vSphere infrastructure for an organization of any size.

Salient Features

  • Describe the software-defined data center (SDDC)
  • Explain the vSphere components and their function in the infrastructure
  • Describe the benefits and capabilities of VMware Skyline

Benefits to students

  • Proven Technology
  • High Availability
  • Large Corporate User Base
  • Ability to Transfer Virtual Machine Images

title: CCNA CISCO Course
description:
Details of CISCO (CCNA) Cisco Certified Network Associate Training

CCNA (Cisco Certified Network Associate) is an information technology (IT) certification from Cisco Systems. CCNA certification is an associate-level Cisco Career certification. These entry-level Cisco certifications all require two exams — one of which is the ICND1, as a prerequisite, which should take about three months to study for and pass. The rest of the exams are a coin flip.

The new CCNA program to prepare you for today’s associate-level job roles in IT technologies. CCNA now includes security and automation and programmability.

The program has one certification

It covers a broad range of fundamentals for IT careers, with one exam and one training course to help you prepare. CCNA curriculum includes basic mitigation of security threats, introduction to wireless networking concepts and terminology, and performance-based skills.

Benefits to students

  • Launch your career with the new CCNA certification.
  • Master the essentials including security, automation, and programmability, for rewarding work in a broad range of roles.
  • Rev up your resume with the most highly respected associate level certification in the industry.
  • Boost your confidence by gaining real-world know-how.
  • Link that digital certification badge to all your social media profiles to tell the world what you’ve achieved.
  • Industry-recognized certification.
  • Proficiency in networking fundamentals.
  • Enhanced career prospects.
  • Hands-on experience with Cisco devices.
  • In-depth understanding of network protocols and technologies.

description:

title: Capgemini 5G Lab
description:
5G technology represents the fifth generation of mobile networks, promising significant advancements over its predecessors.

At its core, 5G aims to enhance connectivity, speed, capacity, and reliability, revolutionizing various industries and daily life. One key feature is its ultra-fast data transmission rates, reaching up to 10 gigabits per second, enabling near-instantaneous downloads and seamless streaming experiences.

Moreover, 5G boasts lower latency, reducing the delay between sending and receiving data, crucial for applications like autonomous vehicles, remote surgery, and real-time gaming. Additionally, 5G networks are designed to be more energy-efficient, promoting sustainability while meeting the escalating demand for connectivity.

With its ability to handle

massive data volumes and connect billions of devices securely, 5G is poised to catalyze innovations in areas such as smart cities, healthcare, manufacturing, and entertainment.

However, its widespread deployment requires significant infrastructure investments and regulatory considerations to ensure equitable access and address potential privacy and security concerns.

5G holds immense importance for India's growth

across various sectors, fostering innovation, economic development, and societal transformation.

Firstly, it promises to revolutionize industries like healthcare, agriculture, and manufacturing through enhanced connectivity and real-time data transmission.

In healthcare, remote consultations, telemedicine, and IoT-enabled medical devices could improve access to healthcare services, especially in rural areas.

Moreover, 5G can bolster India's digital infrastructure, supporting initiatives like Smart Cities and Digital India, driving efficiency, sustainability, and citizen services. Enhanced connectivity would enable advanced applications in transportation, energy management, and public safety, contributing to urban development and quality of life improvements. Furthermore, 5G is pivotal for India's digital economy, fueling entrepreneurship and job creation.

It would enable startups and enterprises to leverage emerging technologies like augmented reality, virtual reality, and artificial intelligence, unlocking new business models and revenue streams.

The Department of Electronics and Communication Engineering

NIET, started a new technical venture in the field of modern telecommunication era to establish the 5G Wireless & Technology Lab with the industrial collaboration of Capgemini Engineering. The 5G-Lab main objective is to conduct advanced field trials of innovative and thematically diverse digital services that require 5G capabilities and performance in the vertical domains of Factories of the Future, Smart Energy, Smart Cities, Smart Ports and Media & Entertainment, directly engaging with end-user actors, so as to validate the technological performance of 5G technology in successfully serving them, as well as validate the business models and potential of these use cases prior to commercial deployment.

title: Automation Anywhere & Ui Path Centre Of Excellence
description:
Robotics Process Automation Laboratory

Motivation

The institute has established Robotics Process Automation Laboratory to meet the challenges of current scenario in the area of research, innovation and development.

Software: UiPath Studio 2019.06 by UiPath and Automation Anywhere CR & Client

Robotic process automation (RPA) is the use of software with artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning capabilities to handle high-volume; repeatable tasks that previously required humans to perform. These tasks can include queries, calculations and maintenance of records and transactions.

  • Hardware: Computer
Specification
  • Windows 7
  • Processor-Intel Core i3-3220T, 2.80 GHz
  • RAM: 8 GB
  • System Type: 32 bit OS

Training Conducted: Robotics Process Automation by UiPath

The Robotic Process Automation (RPA) Design & Development course offerscomprehensive knowledge and professional-level skills focused on developing anddeploying software robots. The course assumes no prior knowledge of RPA. It beginsby refreshing basic programming skills and introducing basic RPA concepts. Thecourse then introduces the UiPath RPA platform and teaches students how to use UiPath Enterprise Edition to automate business processes. The class has a 40-hour theory component and an associated 20-hour lab component.

Audience

The course is intended for students and individuals who want to design and develop robots for process automation.

Pre-requisite Knowledge/Skills

To understand and complete the course successfully the student must have basic programming skills.

Outcome

Upon successful completion of this course, students should be able to:

  • Understand the basics of Robotic Process Automation
  • Use and understand the various functionalities and features of UiPath Studio and Orchestrator
  • Identify processes which can be automated.
  • Develop and deploy attended and unattended robots independently
  • Know and apply business best practices in RPA projects

title: Smart Manufacturing Lab
description:
The Mechanical Engineering Department takes pride in its cutting-edge Smart Manufacturing Lab.

This facility integrates traditional mechanical engineering principles with the latest advancements in automation. Equipped with Vertical Milling Machine Jyoti NUV PX-20 and the Batliboi 16TC Turning Center, the lab provides hands-on experience in designing, prototyping, and optimizing manufacturing processes across diverse industries. These advanced machines are crucial not only for industrial production but also for providing comprehensive training to our students.

The Vertical Milling Machine

Jyoti NUV PX-20 is renowned for its precision engineering, handling various milling tasks with exceptional accuracy.

Advanced features and sturdy design

make it essential for shaping different materials, offering students hands-on experience in modern machining techniques.

Complementing this is the Batliboi 16TC Turning Center, a versatile asset enabling precise turning operations for diverse industrial applications.

With its cutting-edge technology and intuitive interface, students gain practical insights into turning processes, preparing them for industry demands.

Moreover, the department is equipped with a complete computer-integrated manufacturing system to ensure students are fully prepared for the industry. Collaborative research projects and consultancy with industry partners offer real-world applications, while educational initiatives provide students with experiential learning opportunities, essential for success in today's engineering landscape.

Through outreach efforts, the lab inspires the next generation of engineers and fosters innovation and collaboration within the broader community. In essence, the Smart Manufacturing Lab exemplifies the department's commitment to excellence, innovation, and interdisciplinary collaboration in shaping the future of manufacturing engineering.

title: Internet of Things (IoT) Lab
description:
IBM Watson IoT Platform

IBM Watson IoT Platform is a managed, cloud-hosted service designed to make it simple to derive value from your IoT devices. Watson IoT Platform and its additional add on services – Block chain service and analytic service - enable organizations to capture and explore data for devices, equipment, and machines, and discover insights that can drive better decision-making. From chip to app to cloud, take full advantage of cognitive Watson APIs, visual dashboards, rich developer resources and industry-leading security to accelerate enterprise IoT insight.

Vision

IBM Watson IoT Platform empowers data scientists, developers and analysts to build, run and manage AI models, and optimize decisions anywhere on IBM Cloud for Data.

Benefits

The power of cognitive -
Use your IoT data to understand current conditions and trends, comprehend unstructured data from videos and images, and extract unstructured textual data for insights.

Keep your IoT secure -
Manage risk and gather insights across your entire IoT landscape, using dashboards and sophisticated alerts to monitor devices, apps and connections.

Connect what matters -
Link the data that flows from your network of products, services and employees into the decision platforms that support your business.

Maximize your IoT data -
Quickly and easily parse, filter and transform devices and performance data. Cache or archive data selectively for off platform analytics or for integration with IoT apps.

IoT Lab

IOT lab is developed in NIET under the collaboration with PTC and IBM Watson. We provide training to our students on the various development boards like Arduino UNO, Raspberry Pi etc. and the interfacing of various types of sensors with these development boards. At the final module of the training, students create and implement their innovative ideas through designing of various projects. PTC Thingworx platform contains the most complete set of integrated IOT specific development tools and capabilities making solution development simple, time to market fast and end user solution more compelling.

This introductory course will teach the students that how to model, connect, analyze, and build Internet of Things (IoT) applications using Thingworx, an industry-class platform used by developers across the globe.

Salient Features

title: Intel AI Academy
description:
Motivation

In most of the business world today, not a day passes without advancement in Artificial Intelligence (AI) sector as it has become main stream. Few industry experts are of the opinion that Artificial Intelligence is closely connected to popular culture thus driving the people to have improbable expectations and unrealistic fears about how it will alter the life and workplace in general. AI is spreading throughout various industries. Some of them include education, healthcare, banking, finance, and many more.

Industries that have adopted AI on a bigger level are more from the service industry. Even industries like web design and development being impacted by AI in a huge manner. For instance, many web design and development agencies are making use of AI for coming up with more sophisticated website designs and automated codes that help them scale the speed of development.

Outcome

Students learn how to search problem, analyze and formalize the problem (as a state space, graph, etc.), select the appropriate search method, and write the algorithm for it and given a real world problem, choose and implement appropriate learning algorithms such as decision trees, support vector machines, and ensemble.

Software

Anaconda

The open-source Anaconda is the easiest way to perform Python/R data science and machine learning on Linux, Windows, and Mac OS X. With over 15 million users worldwide, it is the industry standard for developing, testing, and training on a single machine, enabling individual data scientists to:

  • Quickly download 1,500+ Python/R data science packages
  • Manage libraries, dependencies, and environments with Conda
  • Develop and train machine learning and deep learning models with scikit-learn, TensorFlow, and Theano
  • Analyze data with scalability and performance with Dask, NumPy, pandas, and Numba
  • Visualize results with Matplotlib, Bokeh, Datashader, and Holoviews
Hardware
  • Computer

Specification

  • Windows 10 (64bit)/MAC/Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor-Intel Core i5, 3.20 GHz
  • RAM: 32 GB
  • System Type: 64 bit OS

Utilization

NIET is gradually implementing artificial intelligence, or machine learning, on campus in ways that should theoretically be able to help with efficiency and compensate for human errors while supplementing our strengths. Machine learning is the capability of computers to learn new information without someone giving specific instructions to them. They learn by analyzing patterns and data, rather than someone programming them. Artificial intelligence can potentially simulate human-like patterns of thinking, but emotions are thought to be exclusively-biological.
